nodes.bodyText: Can this be deleted? Why are we reassigning the URI?
Should we rename these classes and the abstract class, because we added a seperate class for RoleManagementTest in #649 ? E.g. just GitVersioningBackendTest
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -26,9 +30,11 @@
 	EditorTest.class,
 	NewProjectWizardTest.class,
 	CutCopyDeleteUndoTest.class,
-	InheritanceTest.class,
